title: input[type="number"] fires onChange twice when clicking Chrome arrows
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?** bug **What is the current behavior?** With an `input[type="number"]`, in Chrome (confirmed only on OSX), clicking the up or down arrow inside the input increments or decrements the number twice.
